chapters.title: Prologue: The First Message
chapters.info: Zarine ni Bashere t'Aybara, p. 31 (28)—Daughter of Davram and Deira Bashere. She gave up the name to become a Hunter for the Horn, adopting the name Faile when she found out that Mandarb was taken—by Lan's horse. See t'Aybara, Faile ni Bashere.
